summary: Hi, I’m Karthika Arumugam, Product Engineering Manager at Hyatt, where I get to blend my love for AI, cloud wizardry, and building secure, scalable systems that make digital transformation more than just a buzzword. With 13 years in software development and leadership, I’ve helped teams turn legacy spaghetti code into modern, cloud-native masterpieces and aligned tech strategy with actual business needs (not just the latest shiny tool).
background: I geek out over cloud architectures, DevOps, Agile everything, system design, API integrations, CI/CD automation, and cloud migrations—basically, if it makes systems run smoother, faster, and safer, I’m in. My favorite wins? Delivering high-impact solutions that boost efficiency, nail security compliance, and make users (and stakeholders) smile across hospitality, travel, and enterprise tech.

But let’s talk people: I’m passionate about mentoring engineers, streamlining processes, and building teams where innovation and collaboration are the norm (not just something we put on a slide deck). I believe empowered, diverse teams are unstoppable, and I’m all about creating a culture where continuous improvement isn’t just encouraged—it’s celebrated.
about_me.hobbies: When I’m not wrangling code or leading teams, you’ll probably find me on a family adventure (travel bug fully activated), teaching my two little ones the wonders of STEM (and how to build a robot out of LEGOs), or hosting friends for impromptu game nights. For downtime, I crochet, knit, and design homemade clothes for my daughter—think “Project Runway: Toddler Edition”. I also love exploring emerging tech, contributing to open-source projects, and finding new ways to blend creativity and code. Always learning, always building, always up for a challenge—especially if it involves coffee, cloud, or crafts.
